casebody.data:
Lonnell CARTER
v.
ROCKINGHAM COUNTY. No. 406A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Latasha A. Garrison, Jill Wilson, Greensboro, for Johnson Controls, Inc.

Prior report: 158 N.C.App. 687, 582 S.E.2d 69.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 19th day of February 2004 by Plaintiff and Defendant to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of March 2004."

*780
